title: PGIMER Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Project Nurse Posts
description: Post Graduate Institute of Medical Education and Research, Chandigarh (PGIMER Chandigarh) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Nurse Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the GNM can grab this chance and apply for the PGIMER Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before ...
